lemma (in arelations) JE:

lemma (in arelations) JE:
assumes "\<I> p" "\<I> q" 
shows "(p::'a,q::'a) \<in> b \<union> m  \<union> ov  \<union> s \<union> d \<union> f^-1 \<union> e \<union> f  \<union> s^-1  \<union> d^-1 \<union> ov^-1 \<union> m^-1  \<union> b^-1 "

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p, q)
    \<in> b \<union> m \<union> ov \<union> s \<union> d \<union>
          f\<inverse> \<union>
          e \<union>
          f \<union>
          s\<inverse> \<union>
          d\<inverse> \<union>
          ov\<inverse> \<union>
          m\<inverse> \<union>
          b\<inverse>
using jointly_exhaustive UnCI assms(1,2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<I> ?p; \<I> ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?p, ?q) \<in> b \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> m \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> ov \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> s \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> d \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> f\<inverse> \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> e \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> f \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> s\<inverse> \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> d\<inverse> \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> ov\<inverse> \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> m\<inverse> \<or>
                    (?p, ?q) \<in> b\<inverse>
  (?c \<notin> ?B \<Longrightarrow> ?c \<in> ?A) \<Longrightarrow>
  ?c \<in> ?A \<union> ?B
  \<I> p
  \<I> q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p, q)
    \<in> b \<union> m \<union> ov \<union> s \<union> d \<union>
          f\<inverse> \<union>
          e \<union>
          f \<union>
          s\<inverse> \<union>
          d\<inverse> \<union>
          ov\<inverse> \<union>
          m\<inverse> \<union>
          b\<inverse>
by blast
end
